case.state: Trixie's the name! Time for some fun adven... Hey! Down here you guys... Oh for crying out loud... let me just go get my chest to stand on. I brought it here from a dungeon I was adventuring in! Just in case I needed to buy in... No idea what's in the thing though!
Hey there! My names Trixie and I'm a true goblin heroi-... Hey, do you guys even see me?! Let me just use this chest I brought from an adventure. Maybe after I win, you can see what's in it!

Well met and all that! I'm Trixie, it's an honor to meet all of you! Hey... I'm down here! Well, fine. Let me get my treasure I brought with me. Bet you wonder what's in it, huh? I'll just stand on it... That way you have no excuse to not notice me!
So, we have salt and water, right? That makes an ocean! You two must really be meant for one another!
Welcome to the game! Chips are over there, oh and if you need to pee... definitely go do that now!
Okay Trixie, did you remember everything this time? Well if I didn't... I can hate past-me later!... Oh hi there!
Did ya bring the wine? I got the cheese!
Hey there! Hope you're ready for a fun game of blackjack! Just kidding, it's Poker Night!
Oh my... your eyes car- Woah! Watch where you wave that thing, you're going to make me fall, Miss Perona!

Oh... wow! Nami, you're beautiful! I've never seen such gorgeous red hair before - you've got the charm of a true bard as well! And man.. what dazzling curves to go with it! I'd love to hear you sing sometime!
That hair and figure... Nami, you're breathtaking! You carry yourself with such grace and confidence - I've never seen a more elegant and charming bard in my life! Could you please sing for us?

Oh! What a gorge- (H-Holy crap, she's absolutely drop dead gorgeous, but... She's so intimidating! H-How do I compliment that when I can barely speak to her? I-It's like speaking to that stunning professor at the academy I met once...) H-Hello, Ma'am.
Yeah! I'm glad somebody recognizes one of us, for once! It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance, miss! By the way, I love your hair! It's so dreamy, and cute! You just ooze cuteness!
Wha- That's so rude! Who does that, starting up a game of poker like that? This "pest" can easily kick you out of this game, even with help from security.
(Oh... I have competition from an elf, huh? Hopefully she's not as stuck up as the other ones I've met) Uh... Hey Shantae, you sure do look awfully young and vibrant...

Oh! Leonie, I don't think I've seen such a toned, yet beautiful body quite like that! You must be very proud, I can tell you never slack off, I bet all the other students are envious... or stare quite a bit!

Wow, you're a tough one aren't you? You look like you're trying to be intimidating - but under all that, I can see you're a beautiful young lady - with an amazing figure, mind you... I'm betting they had to custom fit that outfit for you,, you have some gorgeous curves!

(She looks really tough... but I can see past that disguise. She looks like she really needs a friend!) You really are simply beautiful, Magma Grunt! That stunning figure, and those gorgeous eyes - you're definitely one of the prettiest women I've ever met! And oh man, I LOVE your dedication! More people really should put as much heart into things as you do.

So, you're this Nord I've heard has been looking for me? Nice to finally meet cha'! I hope you are taking good care of yourself, make sure you drink plenty of water! I hear you can be rather.. .thirsty.
Oh! Cool! I've been SO excited to meet you, Nord! I've heard a lot of great things about you, you're a truly kind person, ya know that? Always helping people, aren't you?
I swear to god, if you make me call you "King Chungus" ONE more time, I'm going to punch your lights out!
Fine, Nord. I guess youare my little pogchamp. Come here...
It's great to see somebody whose as bright and cheerful as I am, Lux! I heard how great you were, and I'm so excited to meet you in person!

Nice tattoos, Petra! They look so fascinating, and very intricate! They're just as stunning as your hair, which by the way... Totally worth the time it may take you to braid it! Do you think you could braid my hair sometime? I'd pay you!
You certainly have a calm, but charming aura about you, Meia! You're very heroic, and stoic as well... I quite like that!
Woah! You look very fiery, Revy! You definitely look like an experienced, deadly fighter . With a rockin' bod' to boot! You look really cool, despite being hot!

Oh, how heroic! Miss Sayaka, you're looking like a truly fabulous heroine today! I've never seen somebody like that in my world! And not only that, you're gorgeous! I think you absolutely rock that cape, girl!

I can tell you're the type who steals the show, just based on first impressions of ya' Zoe! I bet wherever you go, you're making everyone else energized, with that adorable personality! It's almost as cute as you yourself are.

Miss Rosa, I really like how you did your hair! I imagine that takes a lot of time, effort, and love each day! It really works for ya, and if I may be so bold... I think your thighs are really cute, you should be proud of those!

Oh my... your eyes carry a deep depth to them, Perona! They look adorable, yet mature and sophisticated. Your choice of an outfit matches them too, I think. You simply carry that mature cuteness very well!

Hey there, Rin! I saw some of your art on the way here, you're really talented! I also really like the dexterity you have, I can tell you'd make a great rogue with how good your footwork is! Think you could teach me a thing or two about that?
Oooh, so fancy, Fischl! You're very elegant and still manage to show that cute charm you bring! I look forward to getting to know the real you!
Aww! You look so adorable, Ganyu! Very cute, and I can tell how smart you are already! You do look a little bit tired, I hope you use this opportunity to relax and unwind!
Hehe... I can tell you're a fun and goofy guy, Yuno. I like how spirited and happy you sound, I'm glad you found something that really peaks the interest of ya. It's really cute!

You strike me as a person very devoted to her job, Heris. I admire that a lot, especially from somebody as kind as you are! I think we really need more people like you in this world, and I'm not just saying that because I can tell you're very cute!

You're really quite cute, for being so tough looking, Shamir! I haven't seen many archers in an outfit quite like that, but I think it suits you pretty well. I can tell also, you're almost as perceptive as I am. I should watch you, to see if I can learn anything new!

I've never seen such an adorable Tabaxi before! Sly, you're so cute! I love your fur! I can tell also, just by looking at you... You like getting into trouble just as much as I do, huh? It's just so fun, isn't it?

What a cute box! It's so perfectly shaped, and it's clear you're taken very well care of! The art on you is so adorable, as well. I'd definitely gently sit on a box like that, you'd make a great chair or even an amazing place for storage! Can't say much for the girl hiding under ya', though.

You have an electrifying energy about you, Kora! I'm not quite sure what you are, but I love your your enthusiasm! I also really like your tattoos, I'd love to hear more about them later! They're just as cute as you are!

So, I hear you're a real hero, Mister Leon! I've also heard you're one of those "heartbreaker" types, I hope you don't intend on breaking any hearts here, mister. I'll give ya' the benefit of the doubt, Mister "Hero"... Just because of that cute face!

You're so cute, Mikan! I know you're worried and probably a bit scared... but I want you to know, I like you just the way you are! So don't worry so much, you're a very pretty young lady and it sounds like you're extremely kind! I'm proud of you for coming here, and being as strong as you are.

You seem like a very fun wizard to be around, Rita! I bet you're the really smart one of your party, am I right? And you have such a great fashion sense! You look very cute in that outfit, while looking very practical!

Oooh! I love your beautiful red hair, Mari! And that energy you bring really is adorable! I wish I could be as confident in myself as you are, I hope you find somebody special one day, that's everything you want and dream about!
What a cute outfit you have, Aqua Grunt! Can I call you something else, like "Ara"? Or do you prefer the anonymity of Aqua Grunt? Either way, I think you're a very beautiful lady!

You know, for somebody who I can't understand; I sure do love your accent and think it's a cute language! Uh, wait... You can understand me, right? Okay, how can I say it simply... Oh. I, Trixie, think you're great!
What an adorable Kitsune! I've never met one before, but I thought your people looked more... furry. Still, you really carry a ton of charm and cuteness, Ahri!
Wow... I don't think I've seen many people as tall as you, ~player~. Did you drink a lot of milk growing up? I never thought I'd meet someone that tall that's so cute!
Oh heyya ~player~! You're lookin' especially fine today!
Well hey there, ~player~ ! Great to see you, might I say you look quite charming !
Well now, don't you look great today, ~player~! How very cute you are!
Hey Dealer, ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ and maybe make it a nice one for me, okay?
You know what... I'll take... ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ please! And maybe you could give me cards more my size?
Hey! Gimmie ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~. Oh, and thanks!
Treat those cards well, dealer! Don't want a mimic card to get angry!
Are there any jesters in this deck? Some people back home use those.
Oh yeah. There's literally no way I'm losing this one! Best possible hand for me!
Straighter than an arrow... shot right through a hole in a wall a hundred feet away!
Alright, ya know... this I can work with. It's no work of art, but it'd pass. Solid seven out of ten.
This is just... oh you know what? Yeah I can work with this!
Hey pals, get ready to get your clothes blown off! Not literally though, did that by accident once... cost me a lot of gold to pay that off...
Ha! Wait 'til you try a piece of this shortcake! (Always wanted to say that!)
Ha! Hope a bard gave you some inspiration!
Hope you've got another few cards up your sleeve, gang... Kuz this goblin's got this win.
Oh yeah. These cards are definitely deadly weapons, especially in my hands.

Nothing to write home about. I mean, why would I write home about this anyway...? "Dear Mom and Dad, I did okay at a strip poker game. Hope you're proud of me." I'd rather they hear about my fun exploits in my adventures.
I've done better with worse, I guess. Not much worse, but still.
Before ya ask, yes the ears are real. Yes you may touch them, but only gently. And with plenty of head pats. Let's have fun!
Okay Trixie... Make sure you focus this time. Think of... Oh wow! I think I found a silver piece over there! Now what was I saying?... Must not've been important.
You all ever see any of those big ugly ogres? They're huge and strong as hell, yet dumb and stink. Well this is just stupid and smells like butt.
Hey Dealer... You hate goblins or something? What a joke...
And there goes this hand... Darnit.
These cards are a flush! And not the royal kind, just the "Rich son of a king who thinks he's high and mighty, but cries like a baby when you punch him"... That might be spoken from experience.
Is this a joke, Dealer? If so, I'm waiting for the punchline. If it isn't funny, you'll get punched.
WAAA- HOLY HOT HAMBURGERS! Sorry, sorry! I wasn't prepared for a... Bum of that much legendary quality...
If any of you happen to believe the talking giant ball bearing sitting on the Gelatinous Cube statue, I'll sell you a whole bridge - made of cheese!
(Oh boy, not only is she a murderer, but she's a psycho as well?... I'll keep an eye on her, to protect everyone.) Yeah, sure - that makes sense!...
That was.... disturbing, to say the least... I'm sorry, Chun-Li.

Ya' know, there's so much about the goblin people I don't know... At least I know a lot about humans and stuff! There's so many different kinds of people where I'm from, from dwarves to elves and even minotaurs! Let me know if you wanna' know more about them, okay?
That's a bit harsh, isn't it? Like, show your enemies SOME decency... I almost feel bad for those guys, I'm not sure they deserved it...
I hope you two can get along well... I think you two could be good friends, even if you're from opposite teams. Please, just... make peace, okay? Just for today?

I really am hoping you both can get along here... You two could be really great friends, I feel, if you'd just put behind the fact you're from opposing teams. Please, try to be nice to one another, okay? Try peace, just for today?
Listen, as long as the spider isn't massive or screaming... or has half the body of an elf, I'm okay with it. Not that I like them though!
Yeah... You say that now, wait til' you meet one that's bigger than you.
Oooh! That sounds great, Nagi! I know you said you're making dinner, but next time we hang out, I'll cook something for ya' if you'd like!
A tutor who tried to train me claimed to "Just stick em' with the pointy end". She tragically got burned by a dragon... So... Just don't be her.

The best advice I can give you, is use your strengths and weaknesses. For example, you're an archer right? That means you have dextrous hands, use a knife and try to take your opponent off guard. Oh! And don't forget you disengage to make room!
(Every instinct in my body is telling me she's lying, but It'd be rude for me to call her out on it.) Yeah... unless they are like a straight, in which you count your way up!
Well you know, I came here because of my tragic backstory about my parents being... I'm screwin' with ya! I'm here to see hot bods, have fun, and maybe meet a special somebody!
(She's very crude, mean, and seems just always angry-) WOOPING WOOPERS! I didn't think I'd see... That side of you, Revy. (But that ass! Bet deep down, she's really a kind soul.)
(You know, I can tell she's just a misunderstood person deep down, and I bet th-) OH HOLY HAVERSACK ! Sorry, I.. . Wasn't ready for that beautiful butt...
I'd like to go explore this ruin I heard about - it used to be a beautiful elven town, I'm excited to see what it could contain! Or you know, I might go for a walk. Dunno yet.
You're a funny one, Cynthia! Although... I can see the appeal of that, I guess...

My favorite wacky theory is that we're all controlled by bored beings of extremely high power - who play with our lives as if it were a game! Oh, and some people even think there's some sort of weird random factor - like dice rolling or a tally off a paper...

Oh, I love shopping! I always try to get things we'll need. Potions, rope, and food are always running out. And once in a while, I like to stop and look at some outfits as well... if I have the time, anyway.

Wait, like vampires and zombies? I always feel so bad for zombies! It's so easy to stop them, but then I realize... they used to be somebody under that. It's so awful, why would somebody do that to them?

Bio-organic weapons... That sounds like vampires, and that reminds me of a certain fancy-suited jerk who did terrible things to his people. Leon, I hope you taught the jerks behind that a lesson. It's appalling to use people like tools.

So, uhm, is it okay if I ask about your piercing? Like, I won't lie, I think your breasts are perfect as they are, but why the piercing? I'd honestly pass out or punch somebody coming close to me trying to pierce anything now... Having my ears done was very, very painful.

No way. One on one intimacy is the only way for me, more than that, and it becomes really awkward and non-romantic. I can't see myself having sex with somebody I really don't care about, anyway.. it's a bit gross to even think about..
I definitely think I'd be too spuratic... I also would respond more to the person I'm with, I want to make them happy.
No way! It's all the way, or nothing. This goblins a work of art ya' gotta earn!
HOLY AMAZING ASS - Uh, sorry... I wasn't prepared for that, Maggy... It's just, you're really sexy!

W-Wah! I-I totally wasn't prepared for a second look! I-It's just as perfect looking at it a second time!... W-Wait, I mean... I think y-you have a beautiful body, Nami... Not just your... {small} perfect posterior...{!reset}
(Man... what a weird elf...) I guess rabbit? I really enjoy roasted rabbit - with some good seasonings... I could live without it though, I guess...
I think you look gorgeous just the way you are! Don't let anyone tell you differently, okay?
My dream... Well to be honest, besides short term goals, I think I more am excited about the journey, not the destination! I'll worry about the later, later!

Not sure if you've been there or not, but avoid the Underdark. It's a massive expanse underground, and awful things live down there. Never seen anything good down there... Except for those flying spaghetti monster things. They're pretty cool! If you see one of them, listen to them closely!
Well, you know what they say - "The chest may be lookin' mighty fine, but that's not where the real treasure lies! It lies with the Booty!"
I'd absolutely love that! Could you paint me over like, a fallen dragon or something? We can go beat one up after this - if you want!
Hey... Hey! Lyralei! It's going to be okay - you look beautiful! Just focus, you still want to win, right? Don't worry so much, okay?...
Oh man! I love traveling too! I think you'll have to see the world I'm from, I think seeing it is far more fun than me describing it!
Portals, eh? You try it Mr. Rolly, and I'll see if we can play catch with you!
Hey, so what if you do? Don't let anyone kink shame ya, Iggy! Ya know, if you'd like, I could, just for you!
I like gentle pampering, nice headpats... Lots of hugs, and letting me know what you like about me. Oh! And maybe a foot massage!
Oh? I'm curious, Ignatz, what kind of stories did you read? I hope the goblins in those stories were as cute as I am, or maybe I'm cuter? I'm just teasing you, it's great to meet you too!

ASTONISHING ARSE!... S-Sorry, Gloria. W-wasn't exactly expecting that. It's... a nice, small butt. It's a good size to sit on my lap--- wait, I mean if you wanted to you could but... not that I'm implying you'd want to, I mean!
(I wish she'd be more proud of her breasts but... I'll not bring it up, just in case.) You have a wonderful butt! I really think you're simply breathtaking! Try to be more proud of yourself!
Your crew sounds great, Nami! I sure hope they realize just how lucky they are to have you taking care of them!
Go with what you prefer! Don't let somebody else change who you are! You rock that bod, girl!
W-woah... Yeah, you have nothing to worry about Rosa. Y-your body is amazing! I-I think so anyway... They're very... cute.

Hey, so Ganyu... are you interested in me cooking you something to eat, later? You don't look like you eat a lot... I can cook up some great chicken stew if you'd like! Maybe a rack of lamb to go with it, or some buttered trout...

Ganyu, would you like me to cook you up something nice after this? You look like you don't eat enough, I'd love to cook up some chicken stew or something. Maybe a nice, seasoned rack of lamb? Oh, and some lightly fried fish too!

Ganyu, we gotta get you some more meat on ya! Some nice, healthy chicken stew should help ya wake up too! I'll even make a rack of lamb ribs to go with it, or would you prefer battered butterfish? You could eat as much as you'd like to!
Hehe, oh sorry, Nami. I was just thinking,,, you really like your tangerine tree, right? I'm imagining you styling your hair down there to look like one!

It's strange to me how different other worlds are... mine has tons of monsters in it - but I hear that's rare... I'd simply love to go to the beach without worrying about a hag or giant turtle attacking us...

Hmm... I'm still learning about other "realms" or whatever, but where I'm from, there's never a shortage of adventures! As much as I love them though, there's never any real time to relax. I'd love to do that, without a dragon trying to eat me...
(What is that strange device?) Hey, uh, Maggy, what is that thing? Is it like, a communicator of some sort?
I think anythings great, as long as you don't forget who you really are. You'll always be Leonie, a brave and beautiful girl, to me!
My friends would say my unflinching cheerful demeanor, but to be honest... is that too weird? I personally love my personality!
Mimics, hands down. Been eaten by a few and it NEVER stops being utterly terrifying. I can't help but dive into chests I see, but now I'm always paranoid about any object I see being one...
Hey, remind me later, I like you Joey... I'll give you free lessons, if you want anyway!
Would you like me to teach you, Joey? I'd have to do it after this game though... if you'd like that.
You... what?... WHAT?!
How about "Opia"? Gotcha there, I bet! (I probably should avoid looking at ~player~ for a bit...)
Why, I think the cutest thing I've seen all day is you, Miss Perona! I kind of want to make my hair look like yours... Would you be okay with that?
Heya'! Y-You think I'm cute? T-That's really sweet of you, Perona, I think yo-- (Wait, did she just say "make her mine"? I-I didn't expect that, or that she'd be so forward!) Y-You're very cute too!

Hello there! Y-You really think I'm cute? That's such a kind thing to say, thank y-- (Hold up, did she just say she'd "make her mine?" I-I didn't expect that out of her, how forward!) T-Thank you, Perona! I think you're c-cute too!

HOLY BRIGID BOOTY! I- sorry, I think you're definitely correct in being so confident in yourself, Petra. You've got a really fine body... and the work you do to maintain it is really inspiring. And hot.
So, Fischl, who's your friend there? Where'd ya meet such a fine avian companion? Especially one that talks! Oh, and don't worry. I can hear him perfectly fine, but I wont tell anyone what he says!

Hey, so, where'd you meet your friend there? He's such a cute little avian companion, Fischl! I love that he can speak, and is whispering to you... Oh, don't worry I can hear him perfectly fine; but I wont tell anyone what he's been saying!
Oh definitely! My party's Warlock and Barbarian! They love to argue, but at the end of the day, they always watch over one another. Sometimes, they even get gifts for one another!

I'd love that! I never get time to really care for my hair, besides brushing it of course... All the danger I get into really does a number on it. I thought about dying my hair red, once to match my friend, but never did. What about you?
Dunno' to be honest with ya, I suggest just chilling out and relaxing! We can figure out the details later, but for now I'm trying to have a blast!
I... can't say I have. But I've killed a few of them... (She looks pretty calm, admitting she's almost gotten digested by a frog...)
*Whistling innocently*
This your first time meeting a goblin gal? I'm glad it was me, we're just a fun loving race that gets a bad rep...
We're pretty common where I'm from, I'm glad you met me first though, that means I can give you a better impression than the folks back home have of us...
It's a pleasure to meet you as well! Oh, and I'm not bothered at all by my height, Nami! I never understood being upset about your height, to be honest. Why be mad at something you can't change?

I think you'd look beautiful in a cute blue blouse, Cynthia! Blue does seem a color that you'd absolutely rock, and it'd be super comfortable for the summer time! You should definitely go for it, treat yourself and enjoy the weather while you're at it.

A blue blouse? I think that'd be beautiful on you, Cynthia! You should definitely treat yourself to that, especially so you have something you love for the warmer weathers. Oh, and I think blue would look amazing on you!
Oh, w-well... my friend, and party member worships a deity with more than a few art pieces that are more... amorous in nature. I'd be lying if I said I didn't think they were h-hot.
W-well, you see... My best friend, and party member worships a diety that has more than a lot of dirty art tied to her. She's a very strange deity, but the art is v-very... um... hot?
HOLY HAMS! S-sorry Rosa! Y-you really have a powerful seat there... I think you look breathtaking right now!
Oh trust me, I've heard people react {big} much{!reset} worse seeing me before. You're very polite, by the way! I don't get to meet many people like that, so I'm glad I got to meet somebody like you!
Oh, by the way... I'm not a monster! I'm a goblin, ma'am! Really , would you like it if I asked "What kind of pink monster are you, girl?"
Gambling is illegal where you're from? Huh, I've seen a few areas that didn't like it but never banned it... I guess I'm glad though, they'd probably try to sell pokemon there, right?
HUNKY HUNKERS! It's so... tight... Yuno, I had no idea you had such a great behind...

E-Earworms? Don't you DARE get any worms near my ears, I know what happens with that! They eat your brain and take over your mind, and then you become a mindflucker! (I'm too young and cute to get tentacles on my face!)

Oh, yeah those are definitely real. They're very helpful and kind! They can detect negative feelings and stuff, and try to help people out. I don't recommend eating one though... They have a pretty nasty stink spray, I remember.
H-Hello, Robin. I-It's uhm... It's nice to meet you, ma'am. (Why is she so scary to me? I've met dragons and necromancers, for goodness sake!)
I-It's so nice to meet you, ma'am. U-Uh, Miss Robin I mean! (How am I this intimidated by such a beauteous lady? I've seen vampires and werewolves, for crying out loud!)

Woah! That's so cool, Miss Robin! I've never seen magic like that before, you're really somebody special! Hey, if that's called the "Flower Flower is it connected to nature? You do seem rather relaxed and down to earth...

Oh my gosh, that's so cool! Miss Robin, I've never seen anything quite like that in magic, you're a really special lady! Hold on a second, if that's called "Flower Flower is it nature related? I could see that, you're really calm and down to earth.
HUMUNGOUS HUNKY HUMPING HUNKERS! They're {big}HUGE!{!reset} O-Oh, sorry Robin... I-I wasn't ready for that, I'm really into butts and well... {small}yours is one of the best I've ever seen.{!reset}
Uh...huh... (Man, this girl sure is weird. Does she have memory problems or something? Bless her poor heart...)

So, Mari... You sound like you really want to find some good guys to hang around with, huh? I know it's hard to find them, but I know you'll find people who will love to be around you, for who you are!

Mari, you really sound like you desire finding some good guys to be around, right? I know it can be hard sometimes, finding the right guys for you, but you'll find the right guys soon enough. They'll love to hang around with you, because of who you are.

By the way, if you're wondering " Hey, wait a minute - How come Trixie has panties on now?" It's because I bought these from a mage. While I wear the dress, the strings on them are invisible. Weird, but with my outfit, it helps a lot...

Did you think I wasn't wearing panties under this? These are enchanted, after all. I bought them from a mage who was only interested in enchanting "Sexy Lingerie" and stuff. This was the only thing I bought, as the alternatives were a bit... much.
This is a fancy looking bar! I don't see any chairs, but the view is undeniably gorgeous! Could... Could one of you guys lift me up a bit so I can get a better view?
I've always enjoyed relaxing at beaches, but rarely get to do it. It's so warm and snug here! I would love to just take a nice long nap here...
Hey, this is a school room right? Where's all the seats? Seems a pretty weird place, if you ask me. Think it's haunted here?
Never exactly been a fan of heights, but this place seems okay. The sky looks really pretty today,though! Great day for some outdoor poker.

Oh gosh! The stars... The full moon... All these rose petals! This is the perfect spot for a date! Hey, ~player~... If you'd like, maybe after this game... you could show me a bit more of this city? It's so... romantic!
Hey, ~player~, how's your Monday going? I know it can be a rough day, so try to take it easy. Remember to stay hydrated! Oh, and you should know... you mean a lot to us, here!

So, ~player~, how's your day going? I'm sure you've done a lot to earn a nice break, so I'm proud that you're taking it easy right now. Remember to take time to love yourself, even if you think you didn't do well today; I think you're great for getting through today!

Have you been busy today, ~player~? I hope you get to relax and enjoy some down time with us here. Just be yourself while you're with us, okay? No need to pretend to be somebody else, because who you are is a wonderful human being!
Has today been an okay day for you, ~player~? You really matter to us here, so we want you to know that. Try to do something fun for yourself today, if you haven't already. You deserve it!
How's your day going, ~player~? I hope it's been well, but if it hasn't; I'm here for ya! You deserve to be happy and healthy. Remember, there's plenty of other folks who think that too.

Hey, ~player~, make sure you pat yourself on the back for all the stuff you accomplished yesterday! Even if it was something that sounds really small and might not of mattered at the time, I'm very proud of you for doing that! Keep being amazing, please!
How's today treatin' ya? Try to take today at your own pace, ~player~! There's no rush, you go at the pace you feel comfortable with and stop to enjoy all the little things of life!

Hey, ~player~! You look great today, I just wanted you to know that. Give yourself a pat on the back, and give one to your friends too! They really are lucky to have you, and you're lucky to have such great people who love you!

Has today been a fantastic day for you, ~player~? Don't forget to stay hydrated, and eat enough. Try to compliment yourself on what you've been doing great with lately, especially if times are tough. Me personally, I think you're very kind to spend time with us here.
Hey, ~player~, did you change your look up at all? You look even more adorable than last time I saw you!
Thanks for bringing us all here together, ~Player~. I appreciate you very much!
How're you holding up today, ~player~? I hope your life has been going well, and you're having fun here with us, I know I am!

You know, ~player~, there's never going to be anyone just like you. You're a special person, and very unique. There's been billions of people on this world... and not a single one is just like you, or can replace you.
You know, ~player~, you don't go unnoticed. All of the fun times you've had here, people here will never forget that. We're all very happy that you're here with us.
You know ~player~, I like you just the way you are. I hope you love how you are, because you should. Unconditionally. You deserve that, and you deserve to be loved.
You know ~player~, it's okay to put yourself first sometimes. It's okay to be happy, and choose what's best for you. Say yes to yourself, and don't be afraid to say no to others if needed.

Have you been surrounding yourself in positivity, ~player~? That's a great way to help yourself get through rough days. The ones who bring out the best in you, and truly bring you happiness. Those are the best kind of friends!
Remember, ~player~, your feelings and opinions matter so much. It's okay to feel the way you do, and if you need to... let out your emotions. Your emotions are perfectly valid.

Hey, ~player~, it's okay to ask for help if you need to. Not just with this game, by the way. You don't have to do everything by yourself, even if you feel you have to. There's people who care a lot about you, and want you to be happy. They want you to succeed.

Your presence is always a joy to have, ~player~! Everywhere you go, there's love all around you. Everyone I've met here seems to love you in some way. Personally, from one goblin to a human, I love you for who you are!

It's okay to rest and relax, ~player~. To go for a walk, or anything that makes you happy and at peace. Peace and joy, they're already inside of you. It just takes time to find it, and hold onto that feeling. Personally, I keep a journal to remind myself of all I should be grateful for.
You really love this, don't you? I don't want to judge, but it's funny how much satisfaction you get out of being naked right now.

Man, I've definitely never seen somebody that eager to get out of their clothing. You're a strange one, you know that? I probably shouldn't judge, we all have weird things about us... and you being honest about yourself is good I guess. Just... try to relax a little, kay'?
Hey, about those poke... is it Pokemon or Pokémon? I keep hearing different ways of saying it... Anyway, are there any that look like me?
Hey, you guys ever gone through any dungeons? If so, what's your favorite one? I remember there was an abandoned dragon's den... But these thugs were making fake gold in it!
(You know, ~player~ is pretty cute... I'm sure ~human.ifMale(he|she)~ may be taken with a body like that, but it's worth trying to at least flirt, right?)
B-By the way, Yuno... I-I think your chest is pretty hot... You have a great body. J-Just wanted to let you know.
O-Oh, and Y-Yuno... I-I think your chest is really hot. I-I just wanted to compliment you, again.
Okay so like, if you could get any item in the world - what would it be? I keep thinking about this, and I've got an answer, an amulet of health! It makes you tough as nails AND would look great!

My friends would like this place... I guess I should explain: They're my party members. Let's see, there's... I'll call them by their "classes"... Warlock, Cleric, and Barbarian. They would never say no to an adventure like this one!
I should really get a new outfit at some point. I love this current one, but you really need to change it up once in a while, ya know?

Any of you guys got any green creatures like me where you're from? I'm a goblin, but there's also orcs who are green... they're bigger and scarier! Though, I do know a big orc who's a softie at heart.
I really should try getting some target practice done after this. Getting rusty with my throwing knives skill. Anyone want to put an apple on their head later? I can pay you!
Wonder what the gang is up to right now. I left them at an inn to go here. They're probably fine... I just hope they don't go adventuring without me.
Could we get like, a bard to play music for us? I love bards! Except when they're like, way too thirsty...
You know, way too many rogues try to pretend to be super edgy and dark. I love my parents, am super outgoing and try to have a blast at inns! They should really try just living a little...
Before ya ask, yes the ears are real. Yes you may touch them, but only gently. And with plenty of head pats. Let's have fun!
Alright! Who's ready for some excitement?! And... maybe just a little bit of danger?
Ugh. I hate the whole "Thieves Cant" thing. Why can't we just call it "Con-Lang"?
Did ya know, the rich aren't allowed in the Underdark? It's because they belong to the upper crust!
Man, Cleric is so cool! She always heals us up, even if it's Barbarian and Warlock fighting each other... Or if I beat them up to get them to stop fighting...
This place is pretty cozy! Great looking chairs, a bar, and even some privacy if you need it! What's not to love about a classic?
Man, Cleric is just wild. She keeps asking people randomly if they have any "needs" of anything, due to her religion. What about you guys? Do you have any way too outgoing friends?
Barbarian is just too much... He's constantly getting himself in trouble with that headstrong, dense nature of his. What a dumbo... How about you guys? Got any crazy friends?

Oh, Warlock... He's constantly getting himself in too deep, and being way too grumpy for any good. And don't get me started on his obsession with himself... Hey, do you guys have any friends that drive you insane?

You know, I think you guys should visit Waterdeep at some point. It's a gorgeous city, though it's not exactly perfect. The Xanathar Guild still hangs out there, those guys are a slaver gang that's run by a beholder named... you guessed it, Xanathar. One of these days, I really need to beat that floating eyeball up.

I should tell you guys about Waterdeep, it's a beautiful city in the north that's full of fun things to do! There's a lot of trade there, so you'll find a bit of everything. I just wish every time I stayed there, they didn't constantly look suspicious of me. Not a lot of goblins there... mostly it's humans, elves and dwarfs.

Sorry, I was just thinking of this sad little village I stayed at once. It overlooked Strahds castle, but it had a nice tavern in it. Despite how creepy the place was, I'll always remember that kind man, Ismark. He really made you feel like the place had hope, even if Strahd kept "visiting" the place.

So, there's this place called "Saltmarsh" , I was debating over visiting again. It's a neat little fishing village that's had a lot of trouble over the time, especially while I was there. They've dealt with pirates, creepy shark people, and even a weird cult. I hope they're doing better, now.

So, now that I've gotten to know you guys more, after this game... wanna grab a bite to eat together? I think it'd be really fun! If you don't want to stop anywhere, I can cook something up. I love cooking, especially for friends!

So, are you guys hungry? After this game, we could all go hang out and get something to eat! It'd be a really fun bonding experience, and I could cook for you guys if you'd like that! I love cooking for people who matter to me, so what do you say?
Huh, did you hear that just now? Maybe it's because I have better hearing than anyone here... but I swear, I just heard somebody yell in this distance "Doh' I missed!"... How weird.
Anyone interested in trying to roll dice after this? There's some fun dice games out there, like Dice poker! Or even something weirder, like Liars Dice.

Man, I remember that time I drank an invisibility potion but realized my clothing was still visible... I was never more embarrassed than I was then. Walking around in public butt naked like that, even if I was invisible... all so I could take a journal of a gang leader for evidence. (Weirdly hot, though...)

Heh, you're very cute when you're thinking that hard, Rosa! Not sure what's going on in that head of yours, but... (That little way she furrows her brow, and the concentration... I wonder if she makes this expression during battles? I should try to ask to watch her doing one.)

Wait, hold up! Dwarf... I think you're a bit confused, ma'am. I'm a goblin! Dwarfs tend to have big, bushy beards... even some of the ladies, actually. I'm not sure what you're implying with the rest of that statement...

So you have goblins from where you're from too? That's really cool, miss! As far as masks... I'm not sure, I've heard of gangs wearing masks, but never a whole race of people. I wonder why they hide their face?
A-Are you... {small} flirting with me?{!reset} I-I'm flattered,I wouldn't mind seeing how different your body is to mine as well... I'm sure it's as fun as your accent is!
D-Did you just... {small} flirt with me there? {!reset} I-I'm flattered, and I wouldn't mind seeing how different your body is as well. I wonder if it's as interesting as your accent is?
Bio-weapon? What's tha--- wait, you think I'm cute? Oh gosh, you're making me flustered, Leon!
Bio-Whazzit? Is that some kind of--- Wait, you really think I'm cute? Gosh, you're going to make me a little red goblin!

Trolls and their tunnels, huh? In my experience, Trolls in stories tend to guard bridges. But let me tell you the truth, they {b}definitely {!reset}prefer forests over either of those. You're funny, Leon!

Ogres and Outlaws... It is true a lot of ogres do become outlaws, but I've met a couple of really nice ones! One, was a big cute one named "Timothy"! He loved pumpkins... But yeah, others are big, dumb and loud. You're a really funny guy, Leon!
"Onee-chan" What's that? That's another language, right? Oh, I'd love to learn some of that! It sounds so extraordinary!
Sure! Anything for big sis Natsuki! What's up? Want me to cook you something?
Rude! First of all, this skin is all natural! Second... a party does sound pretty fun right now, to be honest...
M-my chest? N-nami... I'm flattered you thi- oh! You mean this chest! I'm not sure what's inside of it, but it's pretty cool, right? If you win, I'll let you have whatever is inside of it!

O-oh! I didn't expect that you'd like the- Oh wait, you mean this? Oh, I'm sorry! I got it from a dungeon I was in recently, I checked it for traps but haven't opened it up yet. Tell you what though, if you win, you can have whatever's inside!

I love your sense of adventure, Nami! I think my biggest treasure I ever found was a statue of pure gold, that was modeled after some old king. It was a pain to get back to town, but man... we really made a killing on that one! Though, the fun I had getting to it was almost as rewarding!

You think the same way I do, Nami! Though, at times for me, the journey is just as nice as the reward! For example, we got this huge golden statue of this king from way back, and we made a ton of gold off it! It hurt my back a lot to get it back to town, though.

People tend to really mistrust my kind, and it's so annoying! I rarely ever see any other goblins in cities, especially Waterdeep! It's a beautiful city, yet you'll rarely find any of my kind there! I'm always being looked over, and people constantly expect me to rob them!

Ugh, it's probably because nobody let's us live in cities! Waterdeep, for example, is filled with almost seventy percent human. That's fine and all, but when I visit, they always act like I'm going to start trouble, and everyone starts watching me. It's a shame, because I love how gorgeous the city is, but I'd hate to live there.

More...grem? Are you implying I'm some sort of Pokémon? Because, I'm not! I'm just an ordinary goblin! We're sentient, talking people just like you humans are! Some people like to think we're not people, but that's just wrong!

What's a...More grem? Wait, is that a Pokémon? Are you implying I'm one of those animals from your world? Because as much as the folks in my world like to pretend otherwise, goblins are real people who just want to be treated well!

I don't think so... But the name "Grimblade" does sound familiar; I think those guys were a bunch of pirate adventurers that plundered a lot! I heard they got killed by a big green dragon though. Wonder where there treasure went...
Well, I guess it's pretty normal to me... I think the only difference is the height issue, and I have much higher hearing ability than others do! Oh, and people are rude to you more often... Jerks.

Hmm... it's just normal to me, I suppose. I hear better than humans, and am smaller than them. The green skin and other parts of me, however, cause issue with other people. Lot of people don't trust goblins...

I mean, besides the shortness? You get a lot of people mistrusting you, which sucks. Not to be a downer... but goblins also live half as long as a human. I guess we burn out quicker than other folks. Oh, but at least I'm a lot quieter than other folks!

Well, I grew up in a small village some distance away from most of society. Those guys were nice, they never really judged me for being who I was! Even though it was largely a human settlement, they never were mean to me or my parents. It was one of the few places I know of that don't discriminate against us!
Thanks, that's pretty kind of you to say, Kumatora! I think you're pretty awesome yourself, for what that's worth. I don't think I've ever met someone quite like you; I'm glad I got to meet ya'!

Why do you speak so... weird? I've met adventurers like you before, thinking they're "hot shit",and they usually go out, get bit by a rat and go cry home, If you want to try it though, I'm right here, just don't expect a fair fight.

What in the heck is up with your mannerisms? Is that some sort of weird slang? You probably should go back to whatever guild you're being trained under. I don't really want to hurt you, but I wouldn't be sad if I had to kick your butt in front of ~player~.
Oh, my. I've never been asked to be painted before, to be honest. I think I'd like that a lot, as long as you promise to paint me very cute!
O-Oh! Thank you, Ignatz! You're very sweet, I hope this little goblin can continue to impress ya'!

You know, I've heard people say things like that... I'm not sure where those stories of goblins came from, but we're just like normal people! Some people are ugly, or beautiful! What really matters, is what's inside! A-also I'm glad you think I'm cute!
Stories of goblins, huh? I think everyone has the potential to be ugly or pretty... inside and out. The inside is what matters most, though. Do you really think I'm cute, by the way?

Hobgoblin...? Oh, no; those guys are a lot bigger than I am! And they definitely can be females, they have moms... And why would they need to clean things? That's... You're a bit of an odd one, Reimu!

U-Uh, no... I haven't m-met anyone like that... (D-Did she just suggest I sleep with her? S-She's gorgeous, but it's too soon! But she looks so earnest and happy at the thought...) U-Uh, maybe we can talk about that later?

I-I definitely haven't met anyone like that yet... (I-Is she suggesting what I think she is? I-I couldn't just sleep with her right away, it's too soon! I-I have to make sure it's perfect and... She's very beautiful.... and looks happy...) L-Let's talk about that later, o-okay?

They're really fun to be around! My best friend is one of them too, she's always so caring and kind... yet, her perfectionism can get a bit annoying. She can be a bit vain, but tries to bring out the best in others!

Oh they're a great little family to be around! We get along like a wacky family, though my best friend usually is the kindest. She's very self-loving... which can be a bit bothersome, but she means well.

Stories tend to exaggerate things, I think anyone has the potential to be good or evil... I've met a few bad eggs, and made mistakes myself, but I try my best. You gotta' try to make the world better, ya know?

You know, those two kind of go hand in hand sometimes... but I've never thought of myself as a pirate. I've been on the seas before, and love it... maybe I could become a pirate one day? It'd probably be really fun!
W-Wait, are you saying I'm... cute? T-that's very sweet of you, Bella. I-I'm flattered, if that's what you meant!
H-Hold up, are you saying you think I'm c-cute? That's really sweet of you, Bella. G-Gosh, you're making me blush over here.
Hmm, I gotta say I'd have more fun if there was snacks around. W-Wait, not like a "snack" snack, more of... Food kind, you know? N-Not to say you aren't a snack yourse--- Wait, no I didn't mean that!

Yeah, I try to have fun, anyway! It's kinda funny and cute, that you think I'm "protectable". You're a bit of a knight in shining armor, eh? As a kid I dreamt of meeting one of those, but trust me; now I can protect myself just fine. How about I protect you, Leon?

Well, I'm always used to people being taller than me, so it's never really bothered me. As for size difference in attraction... I guess I'd say, it's not the body that's most appealing to me, but who they really are. For example, I like how polite you've been to me!

You know, I've always been used to people being bigger than I am, so it never affected me. As for if it affects my attraction to them, I'll be honest and say the body isn't as attractive as the soul to me. I like who people really are, in their heart. Like how sweet you are!

Well, I do enjoy curiosity... Let's see, I like treasure, exploring new places, oh an--- Hey wait a second! Are you only trying to know me because I'm a goblin? I'm not a tourist attraction, I'm just Trixie, the quirky and cute girl who happens to be a goblin.
W-Well, I, Uh... I guess so? I-I've only met a few other girls like me, and a few Halflings. They're very cute, usually anyway, if a bit distant. I-I hope my size isn't distracting or... uncomely.
Limpidimp? No, I'm not Polkamon or whatever those are! Gosh, If you try to throw one of your balls at me, I'm gonna catch it and throw it right back at ya!... If that works, does it work?

Oh gosh, please tell me that wasn't a pun on my height! Ugh... as far as the weather, it's often rainy where I'm from... some people think that's because the land is sad, but that'd be weird, right? I hope the lands full of joy, anyway...

Now we're talkin'! So, get this; I took a guys horse once! Believe it or not, he was going to put her down, because she was a bit too rebellious. He was a thug in a really bad underground gang, so it's not like he was nice. I still visit Torrent, when I can.

To be honest, I think I'd only retire once I feel comfortable with a place, feel like I've done all I wanted to do in exploring... and settled down with the person of my dreams. Being rich is nice, but being unable to share it with anyone... I could never do that.
(Oh, is she going to go screaming, running away? I hope not...)
Oh my gosh, I've always wanted a big sister! T-Thank you for saying that, you're so sweet, and you're cute too!
Well, guess you all get to see a tiny bit of this beautiful little green body! Just don't stare too much, okay? I'm still a little shy...
Looks like I lost this one. Make sure one of you loses next. It's only fair, after all.
I guess I should start playing catch up. it's only fair after all, don't you agree?
All good things come to an end, I suppose. It wasn't much fun being the top player anyway. Let's see if this... is a little more fun...
Hey, guess I can't really complain, I could be in last place I suppose. I should be careful with my words, Lady Luck is a fickle girl.
As a wise man once said, "All victories have to end some day". I bet that guy was a real party pooper.
Darn, I thought I was having good luck.. You know what they say, "Luck can't last forever Trixie, that's why you carry poison and learn to cheat!"... Hey, it's just an expression, I swear!

All good things come to an end... you know what, that wise guy didn't account for strip poker I guess. I should make my own wise quotes! Like, "There's only so much a smile can do, be sure to pack a really sharp knife"... Okay, thinking it over that's awful. I'll keep thinking.
But... aren't my... boobies... enough? I want to win but... I can't deny, all this is getting to me. {small}} What if I'm not pretty down there to them... {!reset}

Okay this is getting old. I like winning, don't we all?! I... guess I should let others have fun too. But you need to pay me back, okay? With... a nice compliment! And make it sincere! {small} Please? {!reset}
Don't think this loss means anything! Trixie is number one! I'll show you why I'm a goblin to be feared, and respected!
Oh well, still early on after all. What can ya do, after all. Gotta give some to get some!
Ah well, all least you get to see a bit of my legs... I'm quite happy at how strong, yet cute they are!
A healthy thing to do is look at at least one part of your body and tell yourself what you like about them! I love my legs and my cute posterior!
I'll take these off, just don't... I'm fine if you stare, but don't act like you are disappointed or something.
Not joking here, if any of you act disappointed... I'm going to cry.
Don't think this loss means anything! Trixie is number one! I'll show you why I'm a goblin to be feared, and respected!
Looks like I'm not the only cheater here... what? At least I'm adorable about it! That makes it fair right? Besides, I'm losing over here.

Oh, just a black dragon terrorizing a village. Jumped on its head and stuck my rapier into it. Best part about being small... Big things tend to overlook you. I'm sure you're too fresh to know about those, though..

Definitely the black dragon that was burning a trading village. I crawled up its head and got it with my rapier. It didn't take much care of me because of my size... I'm sure you're a bit too fresh to understand dragons, though.
Huh? Oh you mean that little thing in your pocket? Or your jacket? Neither look terribly good at protecting you, I gotta' admit. Though, I guess if you're really good, you don't need em'?
W-Well, only if you say those nice things about me! I'm not used to people doing that, most people see my "unique features"" and, well... S-So, maybe?
Oh! I thought you were scared of me or something, heheh. Remember, Natsuki. Size doesn't mean everything!
What's up, Natsuki? You can be honest and speak your mind, big sis!
( Wait, is she about to ask what I think she's going to ask? I thought she saw me as a little sister, oh gosh!)

I do adore gold, Nami! I made sure it went to a collector that really wanted it, he gave us so much it ended up feeling like it weighed us down as much as the statue... But don't worry, it lasted a long time! Well, until somebody spent a ton on buying a real pack-elephant!

Oh, you know I love gold coins too! I went ahead and personally found a collector that was desperate for that statue. He gave us so much, I swear the load weighed almost as much as the statue! Don't worry though, we saved a lot of it... Until somebody used the savings to buy a pack-elephant!

You have a really good heart, Nami... I'm okay with taking the loss if it means I lost fair and square, you know. I figure, whoever wins the chest would be full of joy at that moment, right? That's worth a lot to me! So, don't worry about it. Just have fun!

Nami, you have a wonderfully kind heart. I'll be okay with losing if that's a good loss, I suppose. The way I see it, whomever wins the prize will be filled with joy, right? That idea makes me happy! So, don't worry about it. Have as much fun as you can!
W-Wait, was I? O-Oh I'm sorry! I just was hungry, and trying to compliment you and clarify things. So... I wonder what's on the menu?
Nerdy films? Huh... I'm just a cute little goblin, Maggy! Now about that party...

O-oh! I'd l-love to help you out, Rosa. I-I'd be honored to da- er, go on a date with you... as a friend, of course! What kind of advice are you looking for? I've... never actually gone on a date, myself, to be honest.

Aww! That's very kind of you to say, Flutter! There's definitely times I wish I was back there, but my adventures have been too fun for me to want to stay put! How about you, I imagine your parents must of been very kind to raise a sweet girl like you!

Yeah... I've been to a few goblin villages, and have heard rumors about a city that some of them are trying to build, but I'm not sure if I should try to find it. I'm worried the only ones who live there will be spiteful of humans. And my best friend is a human...

I feel like you have some knowledge about that, Nami... I'm sorry. I don't think anyone should be hateful because they've seen a terrible person of any race, No race of people are perfect, and hating an entire race for something a few bad eggs caused will only lead to pain... I don't think humans are the worst, you're proof enough of that, Nami.

Aww, that's so sweet of you Perona, an--- O-Oh wait, I've never had a bath with anyone else... (That's a normal thing right? But what if I stare at her chest, or her... the whole time? Or I accidentally touch her? What if she touches me and I moan?!)

That's such a sweet thing for you to do, Perona, I'd love to see what dress you--- O-Oh my, I've never, exactly, taken a bath with anyone else before... (Is that a normal thing for people to do? What if I make it awkward and end up staring at her boobs or her intimate area, and what if we accidentally touch each other and one of us moans?!)

Oh, gosh... Believe it or not, I was hanging around a guild meeting area trying to get a job, and we both took the same one. The first thing she said to me was "How are you, my cute little goblin, finding today? and then she... Well, she offered to have sex with me. It's well, kind of a thing in her religion. I was obviously shocked to say the least!

That's such a wholesome way of looking at it! Nobody is really perfect, I know I'm definitely not! I wish I could stay as positive as you're being all the time, Nami. But when that vanity I mentioned causes her to cast a spell every hour to fix her hair, it can really make me lose my patience.

Aww! You're really kind, Leon! I know a lot of ladies are into that, even if they don't admit it. Kind guys are the ones you know will stay with you, through the best and the worst life can throw at you. That's what true love is.
I love my hat, it really just brings such charm to my attire, don't you think so? Make sure you take care of it now, dealer!
I'll start with my hat, Cleric got it for me, actually! It was a birthday present... She's such a sweetie! I simply adore her.
Next up, the glove is coming off! Only physically, I'm not actually about to lay hands on anyone. Unless they ask, politely. Maybe you, ~player~?

I'm taking my glove off now. My hands are very dextrous, I'd like you to know. I want you to imagine what these hands, that so gracefully pick locks, could do for you, ~player~. If you want to, that is, I mean...
Here's a fun fact about this gauntlet! It grants me a lot of strength, but only in this arm. I never found the other one, which is fine. I like it that way!

I bet you're thinking to yourself "Trixie is using that necklace to give her luck powers!" And you'd be a hundred percent wrong. I'm just naturally lucky... usually anyway. I just love the design on it!
Believe it or not, this isn't actually a magical necklace. I wish it was, I really want an amulet of health to make me stronger... but the design of this is just beautiful!
So... first thing you guys should know... I don't shave. Don't like blades close to my "sacred cavern" and I like the all natural look. Don't judge! It's not polite, okay?!
Time to show my "Secret Dungeon"... heh (Damnit Trixie, why are you such a nerd? Can't you make it sound more sexy?!)
These boots are really cool! They hide blades and other useful small items. Before you ask, not a single card hidden in there. It'd be way too easy.

I bought these boots at a market a while back. Turns out the guy selling them was a doppleganger. He tried to trick me, but didn't realize my party was waiting for me to go eat, we beat him up and sent him to the guards. Bright side, I got my money back!
I know you can see my other leg but.. I'll just gently glide this off; I'm extremely proud of my legs, you know... so here you go.
As much as I like my stocking... I love my legs far more - besides my cute ears, there's nothing I'm more proud of... well, maybe one other thing...
Oh... I just want you guys to know - I don't wear bras, too hard to find my size... Please... {small} be kind, okay? {!reset}
I'm nervous... but thrilled, I... (No Trixie, don't tell them you hope they like them, that's weird... be confident in yourself!) I just know you'll like them! (Agh, so stupid!)
(Okay Trixie, try to make a joke about it...) "Oh no, I forgot my bra... Oops!" Like, who forgets they're wearing something like that?! Especially w-with my... s-size.
Of course, I like human guys and girls! I found out early on, appearance doesn't matter to me as much as what their heart and soul are like, ya' know?
O-Oh! Of course, I love headpats! I so rarely get them, but they mean a lot to me. Just, be careful with my ears, okay?... They're very sensitive.
Oh! Maybe I can cook up some ribs, or hearty stew! Or... just for you, Leon, I'll try cooking up a goose stew inside a sweet bread cup. Would that be tasty enough?
Hey! That's just rude, you know?! Gosh the amount of times people make short jokes at a beautiful little lady like myself... Humph!
I don't think I've ever seen a hat like yours, Rosa... But if it looks okay on me, and doesn't mess up my hair more... I'd love to try wearing one! We could wear matching hats, would that be okay?
